headline: Big Bank earnings, Fed commentary, tax deadline: What to Watch
summary: Yahoo Finance host Josh Lipton highlights what to watch on Tuesday, April 15. Earnings reports are expected from Johnson & Johnson (JNJ), Albertsons (ACI), and United Airlines (UAL), as well as major banks like Bank of America (BAC) and Citi (C). Fresh Federal Reserve commentary is coming as Fed Governor Lisa Cook is set to speak. The deadline to file 2024 federal income tax returns is also on Tuesday. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination Overtime here.

headline: Bank of America, Citi Earnings: What to Expect
summary: Bank of America and Citigroup are expected to notch higher revenue and profit when they post results Tuesday morning.  On Monday, Goldman Sachs reported profit that jumped 15% from a year earlier as its trading business boomed.

raw.headline: Bank of America, Citi Earnings: What to Expect

headline: KBW Analyst on Goldman Sachs' Record Quarter
summary: Goldman Sachs Group Inc.'s stock traders posted their highest quarterly revenue haul on record, riding a wave of volatility triggered by an emerging global trade war that's roiled financial markets. KBW Analyst of Large Cap Banks David Konrad has more on the story.

headline: Stock market’s extreme moves portend lasting trouble for traders
summary: (Bloomberg) -- A knee-jerk reaction to President Donald Trump’s 90-day pause on broad tariffs propelled US stocks to one of their best days on record last week. headline: Morgan Stanley, Citi cut US earnings estimates as season starts
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Morgan Stanley and Citigroup Inc. slashed their estimates for 2025 earnings as companies kick off their first-quarter reports, joining a wave of Wall Street banks warning that tariffs will curb profit growth.
